esqlQuery.esql:
// Alert when interfaces drop >25 packets/sec or more than 1% of traffic over the 5 minute window.
// Excludes loopback/container interfaces, requires minimum packet volume, and guards against counter resets.
// Adjust absolute or percentage thresholds in the final WHERE clause as needed.
FROM metrics-system.network-*
| WHERE @timestamp >= NOW() - 5 MINUTES
  AND system.network.name NOT RLIKE "^(lo|docker|veth|br-)"
| STATS
    in_drop_delta = MAX(system.network.in.dropped) - MIN(system.network.in.dropped),
    out_drop_delta = MAX(system.network.out.dropped) - MIN(system.network.out.dropped),
    in_packet_delta = MAX(system.network.in.packets) - MIN(system.network.in.packets),
    out_packet_delta = MAX(system.network.out.packets) - MIN(system.network.out.packets),
    first_ts = MIN(@timestamp),
    last_ts = MAX(@timestamp)
  BY host.name, system.network.name
| EVAL elapsed_sec = TO_DOUBLE(TO_LONG(last_ts) - TO_LONG(first_ts)) / 1000
| WHERE elapsed_sec >= 60
| EVAL in_drop_delta = CASE(in_drop_delta >= 0, in_drop_delta, 0)
| EVAL out_drop_delta = CASE(out_drop_delta >= 0, out_drop_delta, 0)
| EVAL in_packet_delta = CASE(in_packet_delta >= 0, in_packet_delta, 0)
| EVAL out_packet_delta = CASE(out_packet_delta >= 0, out_packet_delta, 0)
| EVAL total_packets = in_packet_delta + out_packet_delta
| WHERE total_packets >= 1000
| EVAL in_drop_rate = CASE(elapsed_sec > 0, in_drop_delta / elapsed_sec, 0.0)
| EVAL out_drop_rate = CASE(elapsed_sec > 0, out_drop_delta / elapsed_sec, 0.0)
| EVAL in_drop_pct = CASE(in_packet_delta > 100, 100.0 * in_drop_delta / TO_DOUBLE(in_packet_delta), 0.0)
| EVAL out_drop_pct = CASE(out_packet_delta > 100, 100.0 * out_drop_delta / TO_DOUBLE(out_packet_delta), 0.0)
| WHERE in_drop_rate > 25
    OR out_drop_rate > 25
    OR in_drop_pct > 1
    OR out_drop_pct > 1
